languages.text: "Домин, воля Неумирающего привела нас к Вени'Заккари, и Он желает, чтобы мы прошли узким и кровавым путем. Сойдем с этой тропы сейчас, и добыча навсегда скроется..."
"Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."
languages.original_text: "Домин, воля Неумирающего привела нас к Вени'Заккари, и Он желает, чтобы мы прошли узким и кровавым путем. Сойдем с этой тропы сейчас, и добыча навсегда скроется..."

traits.locale_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He wants us to walk a path that is narrow and bloody. If we stray off this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."
"Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He wants us to walk a path that is narrow and bloody. If we stray off this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."
"Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He wants us to walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

"Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

languages.text:
「不死の者の御意志は我らをヴェニ・ザカリーへと導かれた、ドミン。彼は狭くも血にまみれた道を歩めと命じておられる。
今この道を外れれば、我らの標は永遠に失う」

traits.locale_text:
「不死の者の御意志は我らをヴェニ・ザカリーへと導かれた、ドミン。彼は狭くも血にまみれた道を歩めと命じておられる。
今この道を外れれば、我らの標は永遠に失う」

languages.text: «Domin, la voluntad del Inmortal nos ha traído a Veni'Zacchary, y nos ordena recorrer un camino tan estrecho como sangriento. Si nos desviamos ahora de su senda, nuestra marca desaparecerá para siempre...».
languages.original_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

traits.locale_text: «Domin, la voluntad del Inmortal nos ha traído a Veni'Zacchary, y nos ordena recorrer un camino tan estrecho como sangriento. Si nos desviamos ahora de su senda, nuestra marca desaparecerá para siempre...».

languages.text: « Domin, la volonté de l'Immortel nous a conduits à Veni'Zacchary, et Il nous force à emprunter un chemin aussi étroit que sanglant. Si nous nous en écartons, notre proie disparaîtra à tout jamais... »
languages.original_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

traits.locale_text: « Domin, la volonté de l'Immortel nous a conduits à Veni'Zacchary, et Il nous force à emprunter un chemin aussi étroit que sanglant. Si nous nous en écartons, notre proie disparaîtra à tout jamais... »

languages.text: “秘者，是不死之神的旨意将我们带到了帷者扎卡里身边，是祂指示我们踏上这条狭窄、血腥的道路。若是偏离这条道路，我们的目标就会彻底消失……”
languages.original_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

traits.locale_text: “秘者，是不死之神的旨意将我们带到了帷者扎卡里身边，是祂指示我们踏上这条狭窄、血腥的道路。若是偏离这条道路，我们的目标就会彻底消失……”

languages.text: "Domin, der Wille des Todlosen hat uns zu Veni'Zacchary geführt, und Er gebietet uns, den gleichsam schmalen wie blutigen Weg zu beschreiten. Wenn wir jetzt von unserem Pfad abweichen, wird unsere Spur für immer verschwinden ..."
languages.original_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

traits.locale_text: "Domin, der Wille des Todlosen hat uns zu Veni'Zacchary geführt, und Er gebietet uns, den gleichsam schmalen wie blutigen Weg zu beschreiten. Wenn wir jetzt von unserem Pfad abweichen, wird unsere Spur für immer verschwinden ..."

languages.text: "Domin, Ölmeyen'in iradesi bizi Veni'Zacchary'ye yöneltti. O, hem sarp hem de kanlı bir yolda yürümemizi buyurur. Şimdi bu yoldan ayrılırsak adımız sonsuza dek silinir..."
languages.original_text: "Domin, the Undying One's will has led us to Veni'Zacchary, and He bids us walk a path that is both narrow and bloody. If we stray from this path now, our mark will disappear forever..."

traits.locale_text: "Domin, Ölmeyen'in iradesi bizi Veni'Zacchary'ye yöneltti. O, hem sarp hem de kanlı bir yolda yürümemizi buyurur. Şimdi bu yoldan ayrılırsak adımız sonsuza dek silinir..."
